nodes.text: Savatte was a Bardottan member of the Bahk-tov Council during the Clone Wars.
When Queen Julia warned the Galactic Republic to assist with the threat of its Frangawl Cult Savatte sat in the council.

After Julia was kidnapped by the sect, Savatte led Mace Windu and Jar Jar Binks to the catacombs of an ancient temple where a shrine was built by the Frangawl where the demon Malmourral was worshiped. The Bardottan gave Windu's lightsaber back, even though he hoped he would not have to use the weapon. After Jar Jar was kidnapped in the catacombs, Mace sent Savatte back to the Council to report on what happened.
